item.description:
I just wanna test out something, soooo- HEY LOOK, A BUTTON!



okay,,,, hopefully that works ðŸ˜­ I'm very much new to this whole rss feed thing, but I wanna be able to use html type stuff in it, too! I like the idea of turning this into a full-on microblog thing as opposed to the one on my music site, which is more simple. I should probably add the titles to that one though ðŸ¥²

item.title: â™¡ B R A I N R O T â™¡
item.description: why is the concept of a new website tearing my brain apart from the inside out ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ like I am SO invested, I'm away from my computer bc I'm supposed to be sleeping and even now I just CAN'T. STOP. THINKING?? Like I'm literally using this bc I already said gn on threads (my main social media) and now I'm scrolling on tumblr of all places, looking at people saying fun it is to make a website

item.title: â™¡ Hihi ^^ â™¡
item.description: NEW WEBSITE NEW WEBSITE!!! I'm very excited abt this one since it's my first fully personal, not-in-character-as-someone-else, personal site! I'm still working out what to put in it, and as of writing this, the website it's meant for actually isn't up yet, but I'm gonna keep updating this as I go :D
